items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE This Dress!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress is absolutely stunning in person. It is a beautiful green color. It is a short sleeve dress that hits above the knee. I am 5‘2“, weigh 100 pounds, and I’m typically a size small. I ordered a size small and it fit perfectly. It has pockets and is very flowy. It is a pull on dress, there are no buttons or zippers. It is very roomy and has some stretch to it. The dress is wrinkle resistant, when I pulled it out of the bag it did not need to be ironed. The dress is not very heavy at all for being a velour dress. The material is not very thick, so it may not offer a lot of warmth in the colder months. The dress is not see-through at all. The quality of this dress is excellent. It is a great value for the money and I highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: Tracy Rainey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegance Meets Comfort
items.body: I recently wore the Simplee Women's 2024 Velvet Short Sleeve Cocktail Dress for our Christmas pictures , and I was absolutely thrilled with my choice! This dress is the perfect blend of elegance and comfort, making it an ideal option for festive special occasions. The velvet fabric is incredibly soft and luxurious, providing a beautiful drape that flatters the figure. The V-neck design and empire waist create a lovely silhouette that accentuates the waist while allowing for easy movement. I felt both stylish and comfortable throughout! One of my favorite features has to be the pockets! They are surprisingly spacious and perfect for stashing away small essentials like my phone and lipstick without needing to carry a clutch. It’s a small detail that made a big difference in my overall experience. The short sleeves are perfect for the winter season, providing just the right amount of coverage while still looking chic. The rich color options available add a festive touch, making it easy to stand out at any holiday gathering. Overall, I highly recommend the Simplee Velvet Cocktail Dress to anyone looking for a stylish and practical outfit for winter celebrations. It’s a beautiful dress that I know I’ll be wearing for years to come! Read more
items.author: elbell78636

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and style
items.body: I was skeptical but this is super flattering and really cute. It’s a good length and provides good coverage. The color is beautiful and it feels like great quality. Bonus that it’s super comfortable and soft Read more
items.author: LFM

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good dress!
items.body: I really loved the softness of this dress. The fit is flattering and the dress is light but not too light to where it wouldn’t be somewhat warm for fall. It’s breathable and a great length. I returned this dress personally because I’m very chest heavy and I did not like how it sat on me. This is not a knock to the dress, but for what I’m looking for in a dress this was not the best choice for my taste. I do what I can for my chest to appear smaller and this dress wasn’t for me for that reason but it was still a very pretty dress! Worth buying and honestly if I got it in another color that was more complementary to my skin tone (also my bad, not the company’s fault) then I may have been more willing to overlook my chest in it. Read more
items.author: Kate M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality & Stylish
items.body: Majestic! Do not hesitate, worth every penny!!!!! I'm 5'4 / 180 and got the XL, flatters everywhere it should! Not lowcut, super comfortable & the blue color is gorgeous. I definitely need more crush velvet in my life. Read more
items.author: Alicia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! It is so comfortable and fits in a very flattering way. I love the velvet material. I highly recommend it. It is great for the fall and winter! Read more
items.author: Jillian

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: I thought it was very cute . The neck was perfect not to deep.. The dress was very comfy . Im 5'1 and about 150 bigger then I've been in years so i wasn't expectedto get dressed up . This dress was the right fit for me . I wear it with a black belt and black boots . Read more
items.author: kskkd

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Cocktail Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Cocktail Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 2-burnout Dark Blue, #Burnt Orange, 2-burnout Dark Green, 3-burnout Dark Green, 3-burnout Dusty Blue, 2-burnout Dusty Blue, 3-burnout Black, 3-burnout Red, #Black, #Dusty Blue, #Burgundy, #Coffee, #Green, 3-burnout Grayish Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
